author: mcconnell
msg: Bug located in 3.2.4, 3.3 and 3.4-DEV - DefaultFactory.criteria.put( "avalon.repository.proxy.host", hosts ) has an incorrect argument - it should be 'host' - error only shows up when ou try to declare an application repo proxy.
